channel.title: How can i publish client or webclient very easy?
channel.description:
Hello. can someone tell me how i can publish my client with all the modifications so other people can log in, it doesnt matter if they have to download it or if it is a webclient
EDIT:
I dont want to publish all the stuff i have in my client folder, only like a .bat file if someone know how to ..
Thanks :)
-------------------------- Nicho1995W

item.title: How can i publish client or webclient very easy?
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

IF U HIDE THE FILES THE PPL ON A DIFFERENT COMPUTER CAN STILL SEE THEM U JUST CANT LOL FAIL!!!

Read full topic
item.source: How can i publish client or webclient very easy?

item.title: How can i publish client or webclient very easy?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, for a non-easily edited version of your client, or what most call “Releasable” just delete all of the .java files, and hide all files except run.bat, Boom, and ready to release client.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i publish client or webclient very easy?

@imsokool22 wrote:

umm heres an idea what base is the server cuz they culd just use a webclient and umm why do u not want to give the client away if u make a copy of the client in a different folder and take ur username and password out and give it away they can just change the ip but most of them dont know how to tho… then they cant do what u dont want them to…
Imsokool22

imsokool22:

then just give out the .bat file and they’ll just run it from that.

the problem is, i cant even run the client with the .bat file outside the folder, how are they gonna run it then?
